mapper.select: select c.class_id, j.major_name, u.user_name, i.course_title, c.course_id, i.course_type, c.class_to, i.course_credit, c.class_syl from k_class as c join k_class_member as m on c.class_id = m.class_id join k_course as i on i.course_id = c.course_id join k_users as u on u.user_id = c.prof_id join k_major as j on j.major_id = i.major_id WHERE m.stu_id = #{userId};
mapper.insert: insert into k_class_member(class_id,stu_id,class_member_id) select class_id,#{userId},CONCAT('CMI',NEXTVAL(class_member_seq)) from k_class where class_id = #{classId};
mapper.update: UPDATE k_class set class_ck = class_ck + 1 WHERE class_id = #{classId};
UPDATE k_class set class_ck = class_ck - 1 WHERE class_id = #{classId};
mapper.select: select nvl(sum(i.course_credit),0) as courseCredit from k_class as c join k_course as i on i.course_id = c.course_id JOIN k_class_member as m on c.class_id = m.class_id WHERE m.stu_id = #{userId};
